ADTEXT_1.description: The Galactic Geographical Society is comparable to National Geographical society. But in space!
ADTEXT_1.message: THE GALACTIC GEOGRAPHICAL SOCIETY: Mapping of body in {system} system ({dist} ly) wanted

ADTEXT_1_INTRO.message: Hello, my name is {name}, and I'm with the GGS. We are interested in updating the map for {systembody} in {system} ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}), ({dist} ly) for which we will pay {cash}.

ADTEXT_1_SUCCESSMSG.message: Thanks for the information. Agreed amount was transferred to your account.

ADTEXT_1_FAILMSG.message: No payment will be made, since you failed to deliver on time.

ADTEXT_1_WHYSOMUCH.message: It is our standard fee for these services.

ADTEXT_2.message: CARTOGRAPHER NEED: Contract for pilot to {system}, ({dist} ly)

ADTEXT_2_INTRO.message: Hello. I'm {name}. I'll pay {cash} for mapping of {systembody} in {system} ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}), {dist} ly distant.

ADTEXT_2_SUCCESSMSG.message: I have received the data, and I'm transferring the money now.

ADTEXT_2_FAILMSG.message: You did not hold up your end of the contract.

ADTEXT_2_WHYSOMUCH.message: We demand high quality maps generated from low altitude, and we pay accordingly.

ADTEXT_3.message: PLANETARY MAPPING NEEDED: For {system} system, ({dist} ly)

ADTEXT_3_INTRO.message: Greetings. You may call me {name}. I am willing to pay {cash} for a thorough scan of {systembody} in {system} ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}) located some {dist} ly from here.

ADTEXT_3_SUCCESSMSG.message: Map has been received, and is being processed. Your payment has been transferred.

ADTEXT_3_FAILMSG.message: Your incompetence will cost you your life some day.

ADTEXT_3_WHYSOMUCH.message: I'm expecting high yield on this investment, if I find what I'm looking for, which is why I need you to fly extra low.

ADTEXT_4.message: MAPPING: In {system} system ({dist} ly) needed for the sake of science

ADTEXT_4_INTRO.message: Hi! My name is {name}, and I'm doing some research for my PhD on the {system} system ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}), {dist} ly from here. I need to get some additional data for {systembody} in form of updated maps, or my supervisor will kill me. I will pay {cash} to any pilot that can deliver this information to me in time, preferably yesterday, as I'm stressed out of my mind.

ADTEXT_4_SUCCESSMSG.message: Thank you! This new data will hopefully help my revolutionary research.

ADTEXT_4_FAILMSG.message: There's no way I'll ever get my PhD now! Thanks a lot for ruining my life!

ADTEXT_4_WHYSOMUCH.description: 'High impact journals' is a recognized term for journals like Nature and Science, yielding many citations.
ADTEXT_4_WHYSOMUCH.message: I'm hoping this new data, with pretty pictures and maps, will increase my chanses of getting my article published in some high impact journal.

ADTEXT_5.message: CARTOGRAPHY CONTRACT: Mapping of planet in {system} system ({dist} ly)

ADTEXT_5_INTRO.message: Hello. My name is {name}. Information is my business and I'll pay {cash} for a mapping of {systembody} in {system} ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}) which is {dist} ly from our present location.

ADTEXT_5_SUCCESSMSG.message: Thank you for your effort. Payment has been made in full.

ADTEXT_5_FAILMSG.message: You need to learn that information has an expiration date. I will not pay you one dime.

ADTEXT_5_WHYSOMUCH.message: You can not put a price on information

ADTEXT_6.message: MAP UPDATE: Our system administration needs help to update maps for {systembody}

ADTEXT_6_INTRO.message: I'm with the administration of {system}, my name is {name}. We need to update our files and are willing to award you with {cash} for updating our information on {systembody}.

ADTEXT_6_FAILMSG.message: We will make note of your much too late arrival in our records.

ADTEXT_6_WHYSOMUCH.message: Working for the government has its benefits.

ADTEXT_7.message: MAP UPDATE: Urgent data needed for {systembody}

ADTEXT_7_INTRO.message: Hello! I am {name}, and my family is in urgent need to find more land, before we're kicked out of our current prospecting territory. We will pay {cash} for good survey data on {systembody}.

ADTEXT_7_SUCCESSMSG.message: We appreciate the quick work, pilot. The money has been transferred.

ADTEXT_7_FAILMSG.message: You show up first now? You have failed my family, and you will be responsible for what happens to us next!

ADTEXT_8.message: CARTOGRAPHY ORDER: Update of data for {systembody} needed

ADTEXT_8_INTRO.message: Hi! I'm with the geographical society, and we need to update our maps of {systembody}. We are willing to pay {cash} for a pilot willing to fly lower than our previous.

ADTEXT_8_SUCCESSMSG.message: Another map to the collection. Please find our appreciation reflected on your bank account.

ADTEXT_8_FAILMSG.message: You fail to appreciate the fine art of maps, and timely delivery of agreed upon date!

ADTEXT_8_WHYSOMUCH.message: The worlds must be documented and mapped, in finer and better detail.

ADTEXT_9.message: MAPPING: Will pay for fast delivery of data on {systembody} in {system} ({dist} ly)

ADTEXT_9_INTRO.message: Hi!, I'm {name}. Me and my family need a detailed survey of {systembody} in {system} ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}), before anyone else claims it. For a fast pilot we will pay {cash}.

ADTEXT_9_SUCCESSMSG.message: Your punctuality and discretion is appreciated.

ADTEXT_9_FAILMSG.message: You're late! Now this is of no use to us, since it has already been claimed. Another opportunity lost. Like tears in rain.

ADTEXT_9_WHYSOMUCH.description: scooped as in missing an exclusive unique opportunity
ADTEXT_9_WHYSOMUCH.message: We do not want to be scooped on this possible acquisition

Distance_reached.message: DISTANCE REACHED. MAPPING. Keep in orbit

EXCELLENT_I_AWAIT_YOUR_REPORT.message: Excellent. I will await your report.

INTROTEXT_COMPLETED_1.message:
Hello. If you are seeing this is because the data were obtained and confirmed what we suspected.
See you at:

INTROTEXT_COMPLETED_2.message:
Hello. If you are seeing this is because the data were successfully mapped. Will be very useful to my friends.
 To complete the mission, you must go to:

INTROTEXT_COMPLETED_3.message:
Greetings again. Apparently, the mission has been a success.
You must carry this information to:

INTROTEXT_COMPLETED_4.message:
Hello. What you are seeing this means that the data collected are very interesting and will be very useful to my editor.
 The delivery shall be in:

INTROTEXT_COMPLETED_5.message:
Hello. If you are seeing this is that the mission is successful now. The data will be very useful.
 Your reward awaits you in:

INTROTEXT_COMPLETED_6.message:
You are viewing this because, surely, the first part of mission has been successful.
 To complete it should be directed to:

INTROTEXT_COMPLETED_7.message: If you are seeing this, the first part of mission seems to have been successful. To complete it you directed to:

PLEASE_HAVE_THE_DATA_BACK_BEFORE.message: Please have the data back before {date}

ACCEPT_AND_SET_SYSTEM_TARGET.message:
Accept and set system target
in the navigation chart.

REPEAT_THE_ORIGINAL_REQUEST.message: Can you please repeat the original request?

WHEN_DO_YOU_NEED_THE_DATA.message: When do you need the data?

YOU_NEED_RADAR_MAPPER.description: Radar Mapper is a ship equipment
YOU_NEED_RADAR_MAPPER.message: Your ship must have a Radar Mapper to perform this task.

YOU_WILL_BE_PAID_ON_MY_BEHALF_AT_NEW_DES.message: You will be paid on my behalf at the NEW DESTINATION

ADDITIONAL_INFORMATION.description: Note. 'surface scanner' is the name of an equipment, that should be translated the same
ADDITIONAL_INFORMATION.message: You will need a surface scanner fitted to your ship. Once you're at the body in question, activate the scanner, and fly at low altitude, until scan is complete. Then deliver the data to me.

suspended_mission.message: Mapping process interrupted, too far from target.

NO_ACTIVE_SCAN.description: Displayed to indicate no scans are active

NO_ACTIVE_SCAN_TOOLTIP.message: Select an available scan to begin collecting data.

NO_AVAILABLE_SCANNER_TOOLTIP.message: No scan-capable sensors are installed on this ship.

INVALID_SCANNER.description: Shown when a scan altitude cannot be calculated

SCAN_TARGET_COVERAGE.description: Tooltip for scan target coverage parameter

SCAN_MAXIMUM_SPATIAL_RESOLUTION.description: Tooltip for scan max. resolution parameter

SCAN_MAXIMUM_ALTITUDE.description: Tooltip for scan max. altitude parameter

PENDING_SCAN_TOOLTIP.message: This scan cannot be started yet.

AVAILABLE_SCAN_TOOLTIP.message: This scan can be activated to begin collecting data.

ACTIVE_SCAN_TOOLTIP.message: Data is currently being collected for this scan.

COMPLETED_SCAN_TOOLTIP.message: This scan is complete and ready to be delivered.
